item.title: 直接跳槽率接近四年低点，显示美国市场疲软
item.description: 费城联邦储备银行的最新数据显示，美国工人从一个雇主直接跳槽到另一个雇主的比例已下滑至四年来的最低点附近，这表明劳动力市场正在疲软。【原文：The share of US workers making a direct transition from one employer to another has slid near a four-year low, according to the latest data from the Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia, pointing to a weakening labor market.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦金融科技巨头 Kaspi 目标 5 亿美元债券交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，哈萨克斯坦最有价值的上市公司 Kaspi.kz JSC 可能最快于本周二发行其首笔债券，该公司已于上周向国际固定收益投资者推销了这笔债券。【原文：Kaspi.kz JSC, Kazakhstan’s most valuable public company, could issue its first bond as soon as Tuesday, having marketed the debt to international fixed income investors last week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的利率策略在想什么？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 理查德-佩里中断九年后重返对冲基金领域
item.description: 理查德-佩里（Richard Perry）经营对冲基金近三十年，2016 年关闭了该基金。现在，他决定卷土重来。【原文：Richard Perry ran a hedge fund for almost three decades before closing it in 2016. Now he has decided it’s time for a comeback.】

item.title: 德国支出投票前欧元区长期债券反弹
item.description: 在就德国增加公共开支的计划进行关键投票之前，欧洲长期债券上涨，分析师称近期的抛售似乎过头了。【原文：European long-dated bonds gained ahead of a crunch vote on Germany’s plan to boost public spending, as analysts say the recent selloff looks overdone.】

item.title: 雪佛龙收购赫斯 23 亿美元股份，称对合并充满信心
item.description: 雪佛龙公司收购了赫斯公司近 5%的股份，以此表明它有信心赢得与埃克森美孚公司之间的仲裁战，这场仲裁战已使赫斯公司的收购计划推迟了一年多。【原文：Chevron Corp. bought nearly 5% of Hess Corp. as a show of confidence that it will win the arbitration battle with Exxon Mobil Corp. that has delayed the Hess takeover for more than a year.】

item.title: 关税威胁经济增长，交易员推升看跌燃料价格的押注
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策威胁到经济增长和消费者信心，基金经理们加大了对汽油和柴油的押注。【原文：Money managers added to bets against gasoline and diesel, as US President Donald Trump’s trade policy threatens economic growth and consumer confidence.】

item.title: 受成本影响，美国住宅建筑商信心降至七个月低点
item.description: 受关税担忧、建筑成本上升以及进入春季销售旺季后经济不确定性的拖累，本月美国住宅建筑商的信心下滑至8月以来的最低水平。【原文：Confidence among US homebuilders slid this month to the lowest level since August, dragged down by worry over tariffs, higher construction costs and economic uncertainty heading into the spring selling season.】

item.title: 船舶爆炸后小塑料颗粒冲上英国海岸
item.description: 两艘船只在英国水域相撞一周后，小塑料颗粒被冲到英国东海岸。【原文：Small plastic pellets washed up on the east coast of the UK, a week after two ships collided in the country’s waters.】

item.title: 尼日利亚通胀再度降温，物价有望触顶
item.description: 尼日利亚的年度通胀率连续第二个月放缓，激起了人们对物价压力已经见顶并将继续放缓的乐观情绪。【原文：Nigeria’s annual inflation eased for the second consecutive month, stoking optimism that price pressures have peaked and will continue to moderate.】

item.title: 希腊股市因技术故障停止交易
item.description: 雅典证券交易所周一下午因技术故障暂停交易。【原文：The Athens Stock Exchange suspended trading Monday afternoon due to a technical snag.】

item.title: 凯悦酒店出售债券帮助支付购买普拉亚酒店的费用
item.description: 凯悦酒店集团（Hyatt Hotels Corp. ）计划于周一出售债券，以帮助其出资 26 亿美元收购加勒比海一价全包度假村所有者 Playa Hotels & Resorts。【原文：Hyatt Hotels Corp. plans to sell bonds on Monday to help fund its $2.6 billion purchase of Playa Hotels & Resorts, an owner of all-inclusive resorts in the Caribbean.】

item.title: 对冲基金就债务计划起诉阿达赫及其亿万富翁老板
item.description: 对冲基金 Arini 和 Canyon Partners LLC 在纽约对 Ardagh 集团及其亿万富翁老板 Paul Coulson 提起诉讼，指控他们的重组计划从债权人手中抽走了价值。【原文：Hedge funds Arini and Canyon Partners LLC filed a lawsuit in New York against Ardagh Group and its billionaire owner Paul Coulson over a restructuring plan they allege siphons value away from creditors.】

item.title: 贸易战不确定性导致买家退却，加拿大成屋销售骤降
item.description: 由于与美国贸易战的不确定性使买家保持观望，加拿大 2 月份的成屋销售降至 2023 年 11 月以来的最低水平。【原文：Canadian home sales in February dropped to the lowest level since November 2023 as the uncertainty of a trade war with the US kept buyers on the sidelines.】

item.title: 普京允许部分西方基金出售俄罗斯证券
item.description: 在计划与唐纳德-特朗普总统就乌克兰战争停火可能性举行会谈的前一天，弗拉基米尔-普京总统允许包括美国基金在内的一些国际基金出售俄罗斯证券。【原文：President Vladimir Putin allowed some international funds including American ones to sell Russian securities, a day before planned talks with President Donald Trump on a possible ceasefire in the war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 被特朗普盯上的名校以创纪录的速度涌入债券市场
item.description: 美国最负盛名的大学正以有史以来最快的速度冲向债务市场，在税收和资金威胁的背景下，趁机锁定融资，以支付校园项目或进行债务再融资。【原文：America’s most prestigious colleges are rushing to the debt market at the fastest pace on record, locking in financing while they can to pay for campus projects or refinance debt against a backdrop of tax and funding threats.】

item.title: Robinhood 为美国零售交易商推出预测市场中心
item.description: Robinhood Markets Inc. 将在其流行的应用程序中推出一个中心，供零售交易商就某些事件结果的可能性下注。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is unveiling a hub inside its popular app for retail traders to bet on the likelihood of certain event outcomes.】

item.title: KKR 老将加盟蓝猫鸮，领导全球家族办公室的推进工作
item.description: KKR & Co.全球财富部门的一位前高管加入了竞争对手另类资产巨头蓝猫资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：A former executive at KKR & Co.’s global wealth unit has joined rival alternative asset giant Blue Owl Capital Inc. to expand its offering to the world’s ultra-wealthy.】

item.title: 预见到 3000 美元黄金即将到来的银行目前仍看涨黄金
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）、花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.随着对全球经济的忧虑与日俱增，他们认为有足够的理由继续看涨黄金。【原文：Bank of America Corp., Citigroup Inc. and Macquarie Group Ltd. have been vocal cheerleaders for gold during a breakneck rally that has taken prices to record highs above $3,000 an ounce. With anxiety about the global economy growing, they see plenty of reasons to stay bullish.】

item.title: 巴西经济活动在 2025 年初超过预期
item.description: 年初，巴西的经济活动超出预期，这让央行行长们保持警惕，准备再次大幅加息并考虑进一步加息。【原文：Brazil’s economic activity shot past expectations at the start of the year, keeping central bankers on guard as they prepare to deliver another jumbo interest rate hike and mull further raises.】

item.title: 特朗普将征收更多关税，卡尼试图拉拢法国和英国
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）利用他作为加拿大总理的首次国际访问，主张与欧洲盟国结成更紧密的联盟，因为加拿大的目标是减少对日益对立的美国的依赖。【原文：Mark Carney used his first international trip as Canada’s prime minister to pitch a closer alliance with European allies as the country aims to reduce its dependence on an increasingly antagonistic US.】

item.title: 美国零售销售额继 1 月份下滑后增幅低于预期
item.description: 美国 2 月份零售销售额增幅低于预期，上月增幅被下调，这加剧了人们对消费支出回落的担忧。【原文：US retail sales rose by less than forecast in February and the prior month was revised lower, adding to concerns of a pullback in consumer spending.】

item.title: 比亚迪推出可在五分钟内为电动汽车充电的电池系统
item.description: 比亚迪股份有限公司发布了一套新的电动汽车系统，这家中国汽车制造商称，这套系统将使电动汽车的充电速度几乎与普通汽车的加油速度相当。【原文：BYD Co. unveiled a new system for electric cars that the Chinese automaker says will allow them to charge almost as fast as it takes a regular car to refuel.】

item.title: 纽约工厂活动以一年来最快速度萎缩
item.description: 3 月份，纽约州制造业活动降至 2024 年初以来的最低水平，而物价水平则有所回升，这与关税生效后增长放缓和通胀加快的预期一致。【原文：New York state manufacturing activity dropped in March to the lowest level since early 2024 while measures of prices picked up, consistent with expectations for slower growth and faster inflation as tariffs set in.】

item.title: 战略公司在宣布优先发售后买入更多比特币
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）的 Strategy 公司表示，它购买了 1070 万美元的比特币，此前一周，该公司公布了发行高达 210 亿美元优先股以收购更多加密货币的计划。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy said it bought $10.7 million of Bitcoin, a week after unveiling plans to issue up to $21 billion of preferred stock to acquire more of the cryptocurrency.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司卷土重来的梦想与现实
item.description:
俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京正在推动恢复对欧洲的能源出口。【原文：

Russian President Vladimir Putin is pushing to revive energy exports to Europe.

】

item.title: 美元下跌为谁为关税买单的争论蒙上阴影
item.description: 从一个国家的货币价值可以看出投资者对执政政府及其管理的经济的看法。因此，美元最近几周的暴跌对唐纳德-特朗普总统和美国经济来说似乎是个坏兆头。【原文：The value of a nation’s currency can tell you a lot about what investors think of the government in charge and the economy it oversees. So the US dollar’s slump in recent weeks looks like a bad omen for President Donald Trump and the American economy.】

item.title: Bumble 在约会应用安全推广中推出身份验证功能
item.description: Bumble Inc.公司正在为其约会应用增加身份验证和其他新功能，试图吸引对安全有较高要求的年轻用户，这些用户是该公司扭亏为盈计划的关键。【原文：Bumble Inc. is adding ID verification to its dating app alongside other new features, an attempt to court safety-conscious younger users who are key to the company’s turnaround plans.】

item.title: Klarna 取代 Affirm，在沃尔玛提供 "先买后付 "服务
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 正与沃尔玛公司支持的 OnePay 合作，为美国购物者提供 "即买即付 "服务，取代 Affirm 成为该零售巨头的快速信贷选择。【原文：Klarna Group Plc is partnering with Walmart Inc.-backed OnePay to offer buy-now-pay-later to US shoppers, replacing Affirm as the retail giant’s fast credit option.】

item.title: 印度认为美国贸易谈判将取得积极成果，关税问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的对等关税生效前几周，新德里的一位高级官员表示，印度与美国的贸易谈判应该会产生有利的结果。【原文：India’s trade talks with the US should yield favorable results, a top New Delhi official said, striking an optimistic tone just weeks before US President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs kick in.】
